SENT.plain: We were presented with a teenage female who developed superior ophthalmic vein thrombosis and cavernous sinus thrombophlebitis after a 1-week history of a single acne-like lesion or furuncle at the anterior tip of the nose
She was managed aggressively with heparin and intravenous antibiotic
Signs and symptoms improved after 2 weeks of treatment, and she was discharged with an anticoagulant
